name: Super Admin
description: Has unrestricted access to every feature and setting across the platform.

name: Admin
description: Full control over all functions except adding or removing Super Admins.

name: Limited Admin
description: Can manage most features but must obtain Admin approval for actions that exceed their assigned budget or cost limits.

name: Billing Admin
description: Manages all financial settings—license types, credit purchases, invoices—and can be assigned alongside any other role.
